B

Bomb - Class in bomberman.game.activeelements
Class used to instantiate bombs whenever the player/gamer drops.
Bomb(Player, Map) - Constructor for class bomberman.game.activeelements.Bomb
Constructor used for whenever a player/gamer drops a bomb.
Bomb(Map, String) - Constructor for class bomberman.game.activeelements.Bomb
This constructor is used for loading games from database.
Bomb(Map, GameMultiplayer, int, int) - Constructor for class bomberman.game.activeelements.Bomb
This constructor is used for multiplayer games.
